column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Being a restaurant owner ourselves
column2: we hold places with over 3k reviews and 4 stars to a certain standard. It's obviously good
column3: in fact we were able to watch over 6 tables sit
column6: pay and leave. All the while we were still waiting. I would say around 50-55 mins after ordering our server
column7: nicely apologized and said there was a confusion (not really giving us an excuse) and that it would be 10-15 more mins and the 2 small pizzas would be on the house. We were satisfied with that
column8: figuring we already waited this long. Although
column9: this info coming from a manager would have been better business.
